remarks: "Associative" law for inner product.  Conjugate version of ~ ipassr . (Contributed by NM, 25-Aug-2007.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 7-Oct-2015.)
statement:
phlsrng.f $e |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) $.
phllmhm.h $e |- ., = ( .i ` W ) $.
phllmhm.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
ipdir.f $e |- K = ( Base ` F ) $.
ipass.s $e |- .x. = ( .s ` W ) $.
ipass.p $e |- .X. = ( .r ` F ) $.
ipassr.i $e |- .* = ( *r ` F ) $.
ipassr2 $p |- ( ( W e. PreHil /\ ( A e. V /\ B e. V /\ C e. K ) ) -> ( ( A ., B ) .X. C ) = ( A ., ( ( .* ` C ) .x. B ) ) ) $.
